item.description: (where the Amber Room used to be, off the District Courthouse Circle in Nashua) it WAS the Amber Room, which went under trying to cater to 19-24yos. New owners seemed to have learned their lesson and have 3 areas, a huge sportsbar (45 screens), nightclub and deck. Since its new, no one has seen it yet. Opened yesterday.

group.name: Meeting & Greeting in So. NH & the Merrimack Valley :)

item.name: Try the new High Street Arena Sportsbar and Nightclub in Nashua tonight?
